Chinese.Description: 蝠蝇会尝试钻入其他生物体内吸收生物养分进行繁殖，被钻入的生物会在一段时间后死亡并爆出大量蝠蝇。同时蝠蝇也会吸引更多生物捕食

English.Description: Parasitic flies will attempt to enter other creatures in which they reproduce until the victim inevitably dies, fresh flies will then explode out of the victim to attract more predators for reproduction.
